TopicTitle: A Question about Attachment Nodes (the Green Spheres)

Articles.Content:
I’m just wondering how many objects can we attach to the attachment nodes (the Green Spheres). The reason why I’m asking I can attach 2 solar arrays (a Mod) but it appears that I could add another object yet I can’t attach a third object to the same attachment node.

This is in ver. 1.1.3

Thanks,

There are two types of attachment in this game, stacking and radial.  Your solar panels, like most small parts in the game, are radial, that means they can attach anywhere, and with any symmetry you want.  Larger parts, such as crew capsules and most tanks and engines must be stacked.  Stacked objects can only be stacked one on top of another and must be attached to a node.

7 hours ago, Capt. Hunt said:

What you call a "radial node" is actually called "surface attachment" and is not a node at all. But in principle you are right.
